name: Love Comes and Goes
description: Kailyn's child support hearing is postponed and Jo finally meets Kailyn's new boyfriend, Jordan. Jennelle is charged for breaking and entering and drug possession, but leaves the court on probation. Chelsea participates in a march for prematurely born babies. She doesn't find it very easy to leave Aubree behind when she goes to work. Leah and Corey are constantly arguing and things get even worse when Leah's mom finds them a new place to live... without consulting Corey. Then he finds out that Leah cheated on him two weeks before their wedding with her ex-boyfriend Robbie.
